excerpt: "The A’s optioned infielder Vimael Machin and outfielder Seth Brown to the minor leagues Sunday afternoon, clearing the way for outfielder Ka’ai Tom to open the season with the major league team. Tom was acquired by the A’s in the Major League phase of the Rule 5 Draft last December."
